PrintingInformation.PrintQuality: High-quality prints with consistent color fidelity throughout the entire print run

ColorMatching.Note: Exact color matching with existing business cards is not guaranteed
ColorMatching.Details: Color output may differ depending on printing equipment and supplier

ScreenVsPrint.Description: Color discrepancies between computer screen and final printed product may occur
ScreenVsPrint.Policy: No reprints at our expense if the issue is related to color variations

PantoneColors.Handling: Pantone colors will be converted to CMYK colors automatically
PantoneColors.Policy: Pantone colors cannot be printed directly

list: Apply a 2mm bleed over the finished size
Convert all fonts to paths or curves
Convert all colors to CMYK or Grayscale (no RGB, PMS, Pantone, or Spot colors)
Set overprints correctly for desired result
Ensure all bitmap images are minimum 300dpi and in CMYK color mode
Ensure reversed type (light type on dark background) is a minimum of 7pt
Supply all files separately as individual PDFs (not multi-page documents)
Ensure borders and type are within safe zone as variations may occur when trimming
Remove registration marks, keylines, dielines, and other non-printing items
If crop marks are required, ensure they are positioned outside the bleed area
